itunes:title: #286 - Podcast Trends for 2022 with JJ Ramberg
title: #286 - Podcast Trends for 2022 with JJ Ramberg
description:
What can podcasters and listeners do to make their podcast experience better? In this episode, Emily of Being Boss chats with JJ Ramberg, co-founder of Goodpods: an award-winning podcast sharing app. They discuss the predicted trends for podcasting in 2022, how to find better episodes in a saturated industry, and how creators can monetize their podcasts. 

Get full shownotes for this episode here >>

—
